documents.document: "Hell, there are no rules here - we're trying to accomplish something. - Thomas A. Edison"
"If you can dream it, you can do it. - Walt Disney"
Be a yardstick of quality. Some people aren't used to an environment where excellence is expected. - Steve Jobs
Are you in control of your income or is someone else? Are you looking for other options? DM us we can help!
"If you care enough for a result, you will most certainly attain it. - William James"
It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.� Aristotle
"Try, try, try, and keep on trying is the rule that must be followed to become an expert in anything. - W. Clement Stone"
"In a gentle way, you can shake the world. - Mahatma Gandhi"
Every young man would do well to remember that all successful business stands on the foundation of morality. - Henry Ward Beecher
"And no, we don't know where it will lead. We just know there's something much bigger than any of us here. - Steve Jobs"
"It's not what you've got, it's what you use that makes a difference. - Zig Ziglar "
Does your boss appreciate your talents? Are you looking for other options? DM us we can help!
"It is not what we get. But who we become, what we contribute... that gives meaning to our lives. - Tony Robins"
Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present. - Jim Rohn
A satisfied customer is the best business strategy of all.Michael LeBoeuf -
"If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary. - Jim Rohn"
"If there is anything that a man can do well, I say let him do it. Give him a chance. - Abraham Lincoln"
The best way to predict the future is to create it.- Unknown
The invisible hand of the market always moves faster and better than the heavy hand of government. - Mitt Romney
"We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, therefore, is not an act but a habit.- Aristotle"
Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other. - Abraham Lincoln
A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new. - Albert Einstein
An advertising agency is 85 percent confusion and 15 percent commission. - Fred Allen
"Success is a science; if you have the conditions, you get the result. - Oscar Wilde"
Profits are better than wages�which do you have? Are you looking for other options? DM us we can help!
"To succeed, one must be creative and persistent. - John H. Johnson"
Know or listen to those who know. - Baltasar Gracian
"If it were not for hopes, the heart would break. - Thomas Fuller"
"Leap, and the net will appear. - John Burroughs "
Enthusiasm moves the world. - Arthur Balfour
Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking- William B. Sprague
"Effective leadership is putting first things first. Effective management is discipline, carrying it out. - Stephen Covey "
Does your boss appreciate your talents? Are you looking for other options? DM us we can help!
"It is the set of the sails, not the direction of the wind that determines which way we will go. - Jim Rohn"
"Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition, everything else is secondary.�Steve Jobs"
"If you're going through hell, keep going. - Winston Churchill"
"Crave for a thing, you will get it. Renounce the craving, the object will follow you by itself. - Swami Sivananda "
Disneyland is a work of love. We didn't go into Disneyland just with the idea of making money. - Walt Disney
After a storm comes a calm. - Matthew Henry
"You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win. - Ted Turner"
Is your company cutting back or expanding? Are you looking for other options? DM us we can help!
An economist's guess is liable to be as good as anybody else's. - Will Rogers
Do you dictate your income or does someone else? Are you looking for other options? DM us we can help!
The dog that trots about finds a bone. - Golda Meir
"You cannot change your destination overnight, but you can change your direction overnight. - Jim Rohn"
Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present. - Jim Rohn
The best way out is always through.- Robert Frost
Are you limited in what you can earn? Are you looking for other options? DM us we can help!
"Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing themselves."
Reason and judgment are the qualities of a leader. - Tacitus
"If you can imagine it, you can achieve it; if you can dream it, you can become it.�William Arthur Ward"
Even a mistake may turn out to be the one thing necessary to a worthwhile achievement. - Henry Ford
"The most effective way to do it, is to do it. - Amelia Earhart"
"A real decision is measured by the fact that you've taken a new action. If there's no action, you haven't truly decided. - Tony Robins"
I rate enthusiasm even above professional skill. - Edward Appleton
Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose. - Bill Gates
Success is steady progress toward one's personal goals. - Jim Rohn
Enthusiasm moves the world. - Arthur Balfour
Success is not to be pursued; it is to be attracted by the person you become. - Jim Rohn
Mankind is made great or little by its own will. - Friedrich Schiller
Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.�Winston Churchill
Wonder rather than doubt is the root of all knowledge. - Abraham Joshua Heschel
"The task of leadership is not to put greatness into people, but to elicit it, for the greatness is there already.�John Buchan"
"I couldn't wait for success, so I went ahead without it. - Jonathan Winters"
Make measurable progress in reasonable time. - Jim Rohn
Success or failure in business is caused more by the mental attitude even than by mental capacities. - Walter Scott
Is this economy affecting your income? Are you looking for other options? DM us we can help!
"Without a sense of urgency, desire loses its value. - Jim Rohn"
The way to get things done is not to mind who gets the credit for doing them. - Benjamin Jowett
The secret of business is to know something that nobody else knows. - Aristotle Onassis
The best way out is always through.- Robert Frost
"If you don't drive your business, you will be driven out of business. - B. C. Forbes"
Every choice you make has an end result. - Zig Ziglar
A person who won't read has no advantage over one who can't read. - Mark Twain
"The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities. - Stephen Covey "
The hardships that I encountered in the past will help me succeed in the future. - Philip Emeagwali
Don't let someone else's opinion of you become your reality. - Les Brown
Pray that success will not come any faster than you are able to endure it. - Elbert Hubbard
"It's called a pen. It's like a printer, hooked straight to my brain. - Dale Dauten"
Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment. - Jim Rohn
"Money isn't the most important thing in life, but it's reasonably close to oxygen on the ""gotta have it"" scale. - Zig Ziglar "
"If it were not for hopes, the heart would break. - Thomas Fuller"
An economist is an expert who will know tomorrow why the things he predicted yesterday didn't happen today. - Laurence J. Peter
"You cannot change your destination overnight, but you can change your direction overnight. - Jim Rohn"
"If one does not know to which port one is sailing, no wind is favorable. - Lucius Annaeus Seneca"
"If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary. - Jim Rohn"
Just because something doesn't do what you planned it to do doesn't mean it's useless. - Thomas A. Edison
"If it were not for hopes, the heart would break. - Thomas Fuller"
All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers. - Orison Swett Marden

"Everyone you meet is afraid of something, loves something, and has lost something"
You don't get paid for the hour. You get paid for the value you bring to the hour. - Jim Rohn
I want to put a ding in the universe. - Steve Jobs
"In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can. - Nikos Kazantzakis"
No person will make a great business who wants to do it all himself or get all the credit. - Andrew Carnegie
"It's not what you pay a man, but what he costs you that counts. - Will Rogers"
"Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day. - Jim Rohn"
Make new friends but keep the old ones; one is silver and the other's gold. - Proverb
What you do today can improve all your tomorrows. - Ralph Marston
An economist is an expert who will know tomorrow why the things he predicted yesterday didn't happen today. - Laurence J. Peter
